name: One Train Trouble
description:
Made for 1classjam, this game was based off a self-made theme from the following wikipedia pages:

  • The Tuscan Florin (The setting and art)
  • Great Central Railway (The Train and Railway)

Yes this game runs in one script, the final script file available to download below.

Controls KeyControlControl/Shift/ReturnStarts game/Goes to the tutorial.
Pause/Unpause the game.
Arrow Keys
Paused: Move the Camera
Playing: Move the train to another city when it's stopped
Credits

Using the following tracks by Kevin Macleod:

  • "Backbay Lounge" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
    Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

  • "Windswept" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
    Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Fun fact, I also drew these other web pages in my random draws, but decided against using them:

  • A Rural District in Iran
  • Some guy
  • A Phone system
